title: FrontEnd Software Engineer (Remote)
description:
* **Role:** 
 FrontEnd Software Engineer (Remote)
* **Location:** 
 100% Remote (Global)
* **Compensation:** 
 USD 70\\-80 per hour



  





**Role Overview** 




 One of our clients is hiring experienced Software Engineers to support high\\-impact research collaborations with leading AI labs. In this role, you will help build high\\-quality training datasets that improve AI model performance on real\\-world client\\-side web development tasks.
 



 This is a unique opportunity to apply your front\\-end engineering expertise to shape the next generation of intelligent systems.
 



  





**About the Project** 




 You will create high\\-quality ‚Äúvibe coding‚Äù datasets designed to train models on client\\-side web development skills ‚Äî including state management, interactivity, UI correctness, and robustness.
 



  





**Projects may include:** 



* Interactive web applications
* Browser\\-based games
* Visualizations and simulations
* Front\\-end tools and utilities



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Write realistic, self\\-contained prompts for client\\-side web apps, games, and simulations
* Develop precise, binary rubrics tagged by verification type
* Ensure rubric criteria are strictly pass/fail and verifiable via screenshot and code inspection
* Design tasks that test UI behavior, logic correctness, and edge\\-case handling



  





**Ideal Qualifications** 



* 2\\+ years of experience in front\\-end or full\\-stack development (or technical content creation in web development)
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (advanced degree preferred)
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, or vanilla JavaScript
* Ability to write clear technical specifications and structured evaluation criteria
* Detail\\-oriented mindset with a focus on verifiability and precision



  





**Project Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 Immediate
* **Duration:** 
 1‚Äì2 months
* **Commitment:** 
 Part\\-time (15‚Äì25 hours/week, with flexibility up to 40 hours/week)
* Fully remote and asynchronous



  





**Application \\& Onboarding Process** 



1. Submit your resume
2. Complete a short AI\\-led interview (approximately 15 minutes)
3. Receive follow\\-up communication within a few days with next steps and onboarding details



  





**Compensation \\& Contract Terms** 



* $70‚Äì$80 per hour, based on experience
* Weekly payments via supported payment platforms
* Independent contractor classification
* Project duration may be extended, shortened, or concluded based on performance and project needs
* No access to confidential or proprietary information from any employer, client, or institution



  





**APPLY NOW!**

title: Framer Web Developer
description:
\\*\\*Remote work
 



 \\*\\*Contract only
 



 \\*\\*Global position
 



  





  





**About Us:** 
 We are White Turtle, a premium Revenue Engineering and Growth Strategy partner for $10M‚Äì$50M B2B scale\\-ups. We operate on a high\\-end, embedded subscription model.
 



 Our digital presence needs to reflect that: zero clutter, highly strategic and undeniably industry leading.
 



  





**The Mission:** 
 We are looking for an elite Framer Developer \\& UI/UX Designer to transform our current website and build two brand\\-new, high\\-converting landing pages (including our pricing page).
 



 We do not want standard templates. We want fluid, bespoke animations, seamless scroll transitions and a digital experience that feels like a top\\-tier SaaS product.
 



  





**What You Will Do (The Deliverables):** 




  




* **Site Transformation:** 
 Polish and elevate our existing Framer site to align with a new, high\\-end "Dark Mode / Monochrome" brand progression.
* **Build Two New Pages:** 
 Design and develop two completely new landing pages from our wireframes, heavily focused on Conversion Rate Optimization.
* **Bespoke Motion Design:** 
 Implement custom scroll\\-jacking, smooth hover states, and complex transitions (dynamic pricing toggles, sticky elements and interactive component reveals).
* **Responsive Perfection:** 
 Ensure flawless execution across desktop, tablet and mobile, with specific mobile\\-first logic for our pricing cards.



  





**The Ideal Candidate:** 



* **The Framer Master:** 
 You know Framer inside and out \\- components, variants, variables and code overrides.
* **The Motion Expert:** 
 You have a portfolio that proves you can build bespoke animations and micro\\-interactions that feel native and lightweight, not clunky.
* **The CRO Mindset:** 
 You understand how users read a page (F\\-patterns, Z\\-patterns) and how to design for conversion, not just for Dribble.
* **The Communicator:** 
 You can take a strategic wireframe/spec document and translate it into a world\\-class UI without needing your hand held.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Skills in Front\\-End Development and Web Design with a focus on creating visually appealing, responsive interfaces
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Programming to ensure functional and efficient server\\-side operations
* Experience in overall Web Development, including both the integration and optimization of web systems
* Familiarity with Framer and other design/development tools is a strong advantage
* Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills
* Ability to work independently and effectively in remote team settings
* Prior experience with scalable and user\\-focused web projects is desirable

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Endur Developer \\- 4\\+ years\\- Pan India** 




  





 We are looking for a highly skilled Endur Developer with strong hands\\-on experience in Energy Trading and Risk Management systems. This role is ideal for a technical expert who enjoys working closely with business stakeholders across the trading value chain and delivering robust, scalable Endur solutions.
 



 You will play a critical role in designing, configuring, and developing Endur\\-based solutions while partnering with Front, Middle, and Back Office teams to translate business requirements into high\\-quality technical deliverables.
 



  





**Location: Pan India** 




  





**About the Employe** 
 r
 



 Our client is a global technology and consulting organization that partners with leading energy and commodities firms worldwide. Known for delivering large\\-scale digital transformation programs, the organization offers a collaborative environment, exposure to complex trading systems, and opportunities to work on enterprise\\-grade platforms within the energy trading domain.
 



  





**Role Overview** 



* Act as a technical expert during hands\\-on Endur development initiatives
* Work closely with Front Office, Middle Office, Back Office, Operations, and Finance users
* Gather, analyze, and document business requirements and use cases
* Deliver solutions through user acceptance testing and production implementation
* Be recognized as an Endur subject matter expert within project teams







**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop, configure, and customize Endur solutions (v15 or higher preferred)
* Provide strong business and technical support across Gas, Power, and LNG trading
* Support the full trading lifecycle:
* Front Office: Deal capture, risk management
* Middle Office: Scheduling, nominations
* Back Office: Settlements, accounting
* Design and implement solutions using:
* APM
* AVS / JVS scripting
* OpenComponents and other Endur technologies
* Work with OpenLink table structures and write efficient SQL queries
* Configure technical solutions aligned with functional and solution designs
* Advise development teams on business context and technical best practices
* Collaborate with QA, in\\-house support, and development teams to drive platform adoption
* Bring deep expertise in at least one Endur module, such as:
* Connex
* Report Builder
* APM
* Settlements \\& Accounting
* Deal Modelling
* cMotion
* Exposure to Azure technologies (Integration Services, Azure DevOps, MS Power Platform) is a strong plus







**Required Experience \\& Skills** 



* 3\\+ years of hands\\-on Endur development experience
* Strong understanding of the energy trading value chain
* Proven experience in Endur technical design, configuration, and development
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work with business stakeholders
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving abilities



  





**What‚Äôs in it for you** 



* Opportunity to work on enterprise\\-grade Endur/ETRM platforms with leading global energy \\& commodities trading clients.
* End\\-to\\-end exposure across Front, Middle, and Back Office trading lifecycle (deal capture to settlements \\& accounting).
* Hands\\-on experience with advanced Endur modules, APM, OpenComponents, and modern Azure technologies.
* Strong career growth in a niche, high\\-demand energy trading domain with global project exposure and collaborative teams



  





**Reach Us:** 
 If you feel this opportunity is well aligned with your career progression plans, please feel free to reach me with your updated profile at
 **chimpy.salgotra@crescendogroup.in** 
 for a confidential discussion on the role.
 



  





**Disclaimer:** 
 Crescendo Global specializes in Senior to C\\-level niche recruitment. We are passionate about empowering job seekers and employers with an engaging and memorable job search and leadership hiring experience. Crescendo Global does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
 



  





**Note:** 
 We receive a large volume of applications daily. If you do not hear back within one week, please assume your profile has not been shortlisted. Your patience is appreciated.
 



  





**Fraud Alert:** 
 Scammers may misuse Crescendo Global‚Äôs name for fake job offers. We never ask for money, purchases, or system upgrades. Verify all opportunities at
 **www.crescendo\\-global.com**
 and report any suspicious activity immediately.
 



  





**Keywords \\-** 
 Endur Developer, OpenLink Endur, Energy Trading, ETRM, Gas Trading, Power Trading, LNG Trading, APM, AVS, JVS, OpenComponents, SQL, Front Office Trading, Middle Office Scheduling, Back Office Settlements, Risk Management, Deal Modelling, Connex, cMotion, Report Builder, Azure Integration Services, Azure DevOps, MS Power Platform.

title: Senior Software Quality Assurance Engineer
description:

**Location:** 
 Remote (India only)

 4\\-hour overlap with EST

**Kore Geosystems builds AI\\-powered hardware and software that help geologists and mining professionals capture, manage, and use geological data for faster, more reliable decision\\-making. Our platforms like Spector Geo** 
 ,

 , and

**We‚Äôre looking for a Senior QA Engineer**

 **functional, regression, and end\\-to\\-end testing** 
 . You‚Äôll validate the entire workflow‚Äîfrom UI through API, database, and storage‚Äîand ensure system reliability across integrations with internal and external systems. You‚Äôll be deeply involved in test design, SQL/NoSQL data validation, API testing, and log\\-based troubleshooting.

* Review business requirements, clarify acceptance criteria, and design detailed test cases and use\\-case scenarios.

title: Software Engineer II
description:
Job Title
   

  

 Software Engineer II
   

  

**Job Description**
**Job Title:**
 Software Engineer
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Participates in the analysis of engineering requirements to support the development of optimal design solutions for medical device components, ensuring compliance with industry standards, working under direct supervision.
* Executes detailed test plans, procedures, and protocols to rigorously validate engineering designs, ensuring stringent adherence to high\\-quality standards.
* Documents comprehensive design specifications, test results, and validation procedures, ensuring compliance with regulatory and industry standards.
* Participates in evaluations of design improvements based on thorough testing and analysis, driving initiatives to enhance product quality, performance, and efficiency.
* Troubleshoots advanced technical issues across hardware, software, or other technical components, employing expert problem\\-solving skills to resolve complex challenges and minimize production downtime.
* Tracks and analyzes the performance and reliability of complex systems and components, identifying areas for improvement and spearheading initiatives to optimize product performance.
* Ensures strict adherence to company policies, procedures, and quality standards, promoting consistent compliance and operational excellence.
* Drafts comprehensive technical findings, design proposals, and project updates to senior stakeholders, effectively communicating complex engineering concepts and solutions.
* Implements and refines engineering best practices and methodologies, driving process improvements to enhance efficiency and accelerate time\\-to\\-market for new products.
* Helps to collect feedback from rigorous testing and user experience studies, incorporating insights to continually refine and enhance product designs, ensuring exceptional customer satisfaction and product performance.


**You‚Äôre The Right Fit If**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline with 2‚Äì5 years of relevant work experience
* Strong hands\\-on expertise in C\\# and .NET Core, with experience building and maintaining enterprise\\-grade applications
* Proven experience with WCF services, relational databases, and writing efficient, optimized queries
* Solid front\\-end development experience using JavaScript / TypeScript and ReactJS for building responsive, user\\-friendly applications
* Working knowledge of healthcare imaging standards, particularly DICOM, and familiarity with healthcare workflows is highly desirable
* Experience with Windows Forms (WinForms) development in desktop\\-based applications
* Good scripting knowledge (PowerShell, batch, or similar) to support automation and development workflows
* Hands\\-on experience with unit testing frameworks and a strong focus on code quality, testability, and maintainability
* Exposure to DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, source control, and automated builds/releases
* Experience working in Agile development environments, contributing to sprint planning, reviews, and continuous improvement
* Demonstrated AI\\-first mindset, with interest or experience in leveraging AI/ML\\-driven approaches to enhance product capabilities and developer productivity
* Clear and effective communicator, able to articulate technical concepts and status updates to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholder.


**How We Work Together**
 We believe that we are better together than apart. For our office\\-based teams, this means working in\\-person at least 3 days per week.
   

  

 Onsite roles require full\\-time presence in the company‚Äôs facilities.
   

  

 Field roles are most effectively done outside of the company‚Äôs main facilities, generally at the customers‚Äô or suppliers‚Äô locations.
   

  

 Indicate if this role is an office/field/onsite role.
   

  

**About Philips**
 We are a health technology company. We built our entire company around the belief that every human matters, and we won't stop until everybody everywhere has access to the quality healthcare that we all deserve. Do the work of your life to help the lives of others.
   

  

* Learn more about our business.
* Discover our rich and exciting history.
* Learn more about our purpose.


 If you‚Äôre interested in this role and have many, but not all, of the experiences needed, we encourage you to apply. You may still be the right candidate for this or other opportunities at Philips. Learn more about our culture of impact with care here.

title: Software Engineer III
description:
* **Role:** 
 Software Engineer III
* **Location:** 
 100% Remote (Global)
* **Compensation:** 
 USD 100‚Äì120 per hour



  





**About the Role** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled
 **Software Engineer III** 
 to design, develop, and scale mobile applications serving millions of users. This role focuses on building high\\-performance, maintainable mobile software while collaborating with cross\\-functional teams across the full software development lifecycle.
 



 The ideal candidate has shipped large\\-scale mobile products, understands performance optimization, and writes clean, testable code designed for long\\-term scalability.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 Mobile Application Development
 


* Design, develop, test, and maintain mobile applications (iOS or Android)
* Build scalable, high\\-performance features used by millions of active users
* Apply multithreading and memory management best practices
* Contribute to API design and system architecture decisions



  





**Code Quality \\& Testing** 



* Develop maintainable and testable codebases
* Implement unit testing and automation frameworks
* Improve application performance, reliability, and stability
* Troubleshoot issues and implement system improvements



  





**Collaboration \\& Lifecycle Management** 



* Participate in full SDLC: requirements gathering, design, development, testing, and release
* Collaborate with product, QA, and backend teams
* Support production releases and resolve post\\-launch issues
* Provide mentorship and technical guidance when appropriate



  





**Minimum Qualifications** 



* 2\\+ years of experience building mobile applications (Android or iOS)
* Experience with multithreading and mobile memory management
* Shipped at least one large\\-scale product to production supporting millions of users
* Strong experience writing maintainable, testable code
* Experience with API design, unit testing, and automation



  





**Required Skills** 



* Strong problem\\-solving and debugging skills
* Solid understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC)
* Ability to work independently and manage time effectively
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* Familiarity with system\\-level software concepts



  





**Education** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field



  





**Work Environment** 



* Onsite in Seattle (Hybrid option available ‚Äì 3 days onsite per week)
* Fast\\-paced environment supporting high\\-scale production systems
* Opportunity to contribute to products with significant user impact



  





**Equal Opportunity Statement** 




 We are an equal opportunity employer and consider all qualified applicants without regard to legally protected characteristics. Qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records will be considered in accordance with applicable laws. Reasonable accommodations are available upon request.
 



  





**APPLY NOW!**

title: Golang Developer
description:
We‚Äôre
 **iRage** 
 ‚Äî a team of quants, engineers, and traders who‚Äôve spent the last 15 years building cutting\\-edge algorithmic trading systems. Now, we‚Äôre taking that expertise to create consumer\\-first trading products, and we need a
 **Backend Developer** 
 to craft intuitive, powerful experiences for traders.
 



  





 If you love fintech, complex workflows, and designing for real\\-time data, this is your role.
 



  





**Role Summary** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled Go Language Developer with experience in the stock market or financial services industry. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust, scalable, and high\\-performance applications tailored to the stock market domain. This role requires a deep understanding of financial markets, trading systems, and data processing.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 ‚óè Design and Development: Develop, maintain, and optimize Go\\-based applications and services, focusing on real\\-time data processing, trading platforms, and financial analysis tools.
 



 ‚óè API Integration: Work on integrating third\\-party APIs for market data, trading systems, and other financial services.
 



 ‚óè Performance Optimization: Ensure the performance, scalability, and reliability of Go applications, particularly in high\\-volume trading environments.
 



 ‚óè Data Management: Develop solutions for real\\-time data ingestion, processing, and analysis, including market data feeds and transactional data.
 



 ‚óè Collaboration: Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including front\\-end developers, data scientists, and financial analysts, to deliver end\\-to\\-end solutions.
 



 ‚óè Testing and Debugging: Write unit tests, perform debugging, and ensure code quality through continuous integration and deployment practices.
 



 ‚óè Security Compliance: Ensure that all developed software complies with industry standards, including data security and regulatory requirements in the financial sector.
 



  





**Required Skills and Qualifications** 




 ‚óè Experience: 3\\+ years of experience in Go programming, with a strong understanding of the language‚Äôs paradigms, constructs, and idioms.
 



 ‚óè Stock Market Domain: Solid understanding of financial markets, trading systems, and related technologies.
 



 ‚óè Concurrency: Proficiency in writing concurrent and high\\-performance applications using Go‚Äôs goroutines and channels.
 



 ‚óè APIs and Microservices: Experience in designing and consuming RESTful APIs and working with microservices architecture.
 



 ‚óè Database Knowledge: Strong experience with databases (SQL, NoSQL) and data storage solutions, particularly in handling large datasets.
 



 ‚óè Tools and Frameworks: Familiarity with Go frameworks like Gin, Echo, or similar, and experience with tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 ‚óè Version Control: Proficient in using Git for version control.
 



 ‚óè Problem Solving: Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to work in a fast\\-paced environment.
 



 ‚óè Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
 



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 




 ‚óè Financial Software: Experience in developing or working on financial software like trading platforms, order management systems, or portfolio management tools.
 



 ‚óè Real\\-Time Systems: Familiarity with real\\-time data processing frameworks and messaging systems (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ).
 



 ‚óè Cloud Services: Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and related services in the context of financial applications.
 



 ‚óè Certifications: Relevant certifications in Go programming or financial markets (e.g., CFA, FINRA) are a plus.
 







**Why You‚Äôll Love Working Here** 




 We‚Äôre a team that hustles‚Äîplain and simple. But we also believe life outside work matters. No cubicles, no suits‚Äîjust great people doing great work in a space built for comfort and creativity.
 



  





**Here‚Äôs what we offer:** 




 üí∞
 **Competitive salary** 
 ‚Äì Get paid what you‚Äôre worth.
 



 üå¥

 üåç
 **Work with the best**

 ‚úàÔ∏è

 ‚Äì Multiple bonuses for those who go above and beyond.
 



 üè•
 **Health covered** 
 ‚Äì Comprehensive insurance so you‚Äôre always protected.
 



 ‚ö°

 üèãÔ∏è

 üöö
 **Relocation support**

 We work hard, play hard, and grow together. Join us.

title: Pyspark
description:
**Company Description**

 PPStack is a pioneering global EdTech company dedicated to building a smarter future through digital empowerment, innovative teaching methods, and transformative career opportunities. Our mission is to bridge the gap between education and industry by equipping learners‚Äîstudents, professionals, and organizations‚Äîwith future\\-ready skills and tools for the digital age. Leveraging technologies such as artificial intelligence, we provide innovative learning platforms, bootcamps, corporate training, and career\\-focused services worldwide. By fostering academic\\-industry partnerships and developing cutting\\-edge educational solutions, PPStack drives transformation in education, careers, and digital growth to prepare individuals and organizations for a dynamic world.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote PySpark Developer role. As a PySpark Developer, you will work on designing, coding, debugging, and managing data pipelines and applications using PySpark. Your responsibilities will include analyzing complex datasets, optimizing performance, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver innovative and scalable data solutions. You will actively participate in data migration, integration, and transformation tasks to enable seamless data processing across platforms. The role also involves addressing data challenges to meet business requirements effectively.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in PySpark and large\\-scale data processing frameworks (e.g., Hadoop, Apache Spark).
* Strong understanding of data modeling, ETL development, and workflow orchestration tools.
* Excellent programming skills in Python, along with knowledge of SQL for query optimization and data manipulation.
* Experience with data pipeline design, distributed computing, and handling large datasets in a clustered environment.
* Ability to collaborate with cross\\-functional teams and communicate technical concepts clearly.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and a proactive approach to identifying and addressing data\\-related issues.
* Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or related field.
* Prior experience in a PySpark development role and familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.

title: Comfy Ui (Gen Ai) Specialist/Developer
description:
We are an early\\-stage startup operating at the intersection of generative AI, digital media, and publishing. This role offers significant entrepreneurial and creative freedom within a fast\\-moving environment. You will have the opportunity to apply your existing technical expertise while developing highly relevant skills in a rapidly emerging sector where virtual influencers and AI\\-generated personas are increasingly reshaping digital media.
 



  





 We are looking for an experienced ComfyUI specialist to design and operate a scalable generation pipeline capable of producing several hundred consistent character images per day across multiple distinct characters, as well as short video clips.
 



  





 This is a technical production role, not a prompt\\-engineering position. The ideal candidate can design modular, reusable ComfyUI workflows, implement batch automation, manage LoRAs and seeds for character consistency, and optimize GPU/VRAM performance for high\\-throughput output.
 



  





 Required expertise:
 



  




* Advanced ComfyUI workflow architecture
* LoRA training and integration
* ControlNet, IPAdapter, embeddings, checkpoint management
* Automation logic (CSV/JSON\\-driven prompts, structured outputs)
* GPU optimization and remote server environments (SSH, hosted GPUs)



  





 Experience with AnimateDiff or Stable Video Diffusion and maintaining identity consistency across frames is strongly preferred.
 



  





 You must be comfortable working with unrestricted Stable Diffusion checkpoints.
 



  





 This is ongoing work with long\\-term potential.
 



  





 To apply, please share:
 



  




* Portfolio demonstrating consistent multi\\-character outputs (image \\+ video if available)
* Brief overview of your ComfyUI setup and hardware/cloud environment
* Your rate and availability



  





 Only candidates with demonstrable production\\-level experience will be considered.

title: Sr. Software Engineer
description:
Job Purpose and Impact
   

  

 We are seeking a senior technical expert with deep Windows engineering experience to support application teams as they migrate diverse Windows\\-based workloads (including homegrown applications, commercial off\\-the\\-shelf (COTS) products, and legacy services) into modern AWS\\-hosted environments. As a Cloud Migration Engineer, you will play a critical role in developing test plans, validating application behavior in new environments, externalizing configuration, troubleshooting migration issues, and teaching teams how to operate successfully in their target cloud environment.
   

  

 You will work directly with engineering and product teams to clarify dependencies, modernize operational practices, and reduce risk through structured testing and deep technical guidance. Your work ensures that migrated applications are reliable, supportable, and aligned with enterprise standards.
   

  

 Key Accountabilities
   

  

* Develop and execute detailed test plans for Windows\\-based workloads including: COTS applications, IIS/.NET services, Windows services, scheduled tasks, and SQL\\-connected systems. Validate functionality, configuration, networking, authentication, and performance in the target AWS environment.
* Lead hands\\-on migration execution, assisting teams with installation validation, connectivity testing, functional smoke tests, configuration extraction, externalizing environment\\-specific settings, and resolving issues involving registry keys, service identities, permissions, certificate stores, firewall rules, DNS, authentication, and other Windows platform dependencies.
* Teach, coach, and support application teams by explaining root causes, guiding them through remediating environment differences, helping redesign configuration models to be portable, and mentoring teams in operational best practices, troubleshooting techniques, and cloud\\-aligned patterns.
* Improve migration consistency by creating scripts, runbooks, and repeatable validation steps for common Windows issues such as missing dependencies, blocked ports, legacy configuration paths, local account usage, registry drift, and environment inconsistencies.
* Collaborate cross\\-functionally with infrastructure, security, and network teams to align migration prerequisites, resolve cross\\-cutting issues, and help standardize practices for identity, logging, monitoring, access, and AMI lifecycle.
* Independently handle complex technical issues with minimal supervision, while escalating only the most complex or systemic issues to specialized teams.
* Other duties as assigned.


**Qualifications**
 MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
   

  

* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a related field or equivalent experience
* Confirmed experience troubleshooting Windows Server environments, including application services, configuration management, SQL connectivity, certificate stores, and Active Directory integration
* Demonstrated experience supporting cloud\\-hosted Windows workloads (AWS, Azure, or similar)
* Practical experience diagnosing network issues such as firewall rules, security groups, DNS, routing, and port\\-level connectivity
* Minimum of four years of related work experience
* Other minimum qualifications may apply


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience migrating COTS applications to AWS, including handling installers, licensing models, vendor\\-defined configuration, and environment prerequisites
* Strong proficiency with Windows diagnostic tools (Event Viewer, PerfMon, Resource Monitor, Services MMC, Registry Editor, IIS Manager when applicable) and network troubleshooting tools (netsh, Test\\-NetConnection, nslookup, PowerShell networking utilities)
* Experience analyzing AWS networking constructs to resolve connectivity and hybrid networking issues
* Experience establishing effective monitoring, logging, and observability practices to support post\\-migration reliability
* Ability to coach application teams through dependency mapping, configuration externalization, troubleshooting exercises, and reducing machine\\-specific behavior
* Familiarity with PowerShell for automation, diagnostics, and configuration extraction
* Experience resolving common migration blockers such as hardcoded paths, installer prerequisites, registry\\-only configuration models, licensing constraints, legacy authentication challenges, and complex service dependencies
